title: Facet estimation on stream
description:
I'm going to use Count Min Sketch algorithm on streaming data in order to estimate top hitters.
It will be implemented as special aggregate function.
In order to improve user's experience first response should be provided in sub-second latency. Next bulks should improve accuracy of estimation.
